__e: Dr. Randall, it's no secret what's going on here.
Randall, I'm not mad at you necessarily, but I need to know exactly what happened.
A friend of jack randall's can be no friend of yours.
I know I shouldn't be calling you, but... my God, Randall is seeing things,
You told me Randall is alive, and now I can be the one to end his life.
Hey, if you talk to him, let him know Randall's back.
And then go on the photo shoot with Randall and be great there, too.
All I know about that is Randall was there and the mother of my child was killed.
I saw myself... And then I saw myself say that, too.
